00002 /* Finite domain CSP class */
00003 class CSProblem : public OpProblem
00004 { public :
00005 
00007 /* constraint number */
00008   int nbconst;
00009 
00011 /* domain array : each domain is implemented by a vector of integers */
00012   vector<int>* tabdomains;  
00014 /* for each variable, domain number : index in tabdomains array */
00015   int* domains;
00017 /* connections table : for each variable, vector of connected variables */
00018   vector<int>* connections;
00020 /* constructor */
00021   CSProblem (int nbvar, int nbconst);
00023 /* constructor with lower bound (stopping condition when it is reached) */
00024   CSProblem (int nbvar, int nbconst, int lower);
00025   ~CSProblem();
00026   void move_execution(Configuration* configuration, Move* move);
00028 /* the domain size of variable var */
00029   virtual int variable_domainsize (int var);
00030   void random_configuration(Configuration* configuration);
00032 /* a variable randomly chosen */
00033   virtual int random_variable(Configuration* configuration);
00034 /* a variable taking part to a conflict in the configuration */
00035   virtual int random_conflict_variable(Configuration* configuration);
00037 /* a value for variable var, randomly chosen in its domain, if possible distinct with val : returns the index of the value in the domain */
00038   virtual int random_value(int var,int val);
00040 /* a value in the domain minimizing the conflict with the configuration (implementation of Minton min-conflict heuristics) 
00041 returns the index of the value in the domain */
00042   virtual int min_conflict_value(int var,int val, Configuration * configuration);
00044 /* standard domain initialization : a unique domain number 0 for all variables */
00045   virtual void init_domains(int nbvar, int s );
00047 /* standard unique domain : integers from 0 to s-1 */
00048   virtual void init_tabdomains(int s);
00050 /* compute the variables in conflict : rebuilding the vector of conflict variables of the configuration*/
00051   void compute_var_conflict(Configuration* configuration);
00052   void best_config_analysis();
00053   void best_config_write();
00054   int move_evaluation(Configuration* configuration,Move* move);
00055   void init_population (Configuration** population,int populationsize);
00056   Configuration* create_configuration();
00057   Move* create_move();

00059   void next_move(Configuration* configuration, Move* move, NeighborhoodSearch* nbhs);   
00061 /* set the domains and connections of a problem */
00062   virtual  void set_domains_connections( int* dom, vector<int>* tabledom, vector<int> * connect );
00064 /* initialization of the domains : call init_domains and init_tabdomains */
00065   virtual void init_domain_tabdomain();
00066   int tabuindex(Move* move, Configuration* config);
00067   int tabuinverseindex(Move* move, Configuration* config);
00068   int nbtabuindex();

00073 /* Binary CSPs : addition of the constraints array */ 
00074 class BinaryCSProblem : public CSProblem
00075 { public :
00079 /* for a couple (i,j) of variables, (i<j) , constraints[i][j] returns the constraint number + 1 if the variables are connected, 0 si the variables are not connected. It is assumed that at most one constraint exists between two variables
00080 (if not use WeightExtensionBinaryCSP class) */
00081   int** constraints;

00084   ~BinaryCSProblem() {;};
